supportTickets.title: Feature `download` doesn't work
supportTickets.description: The feature `download` in the main page of the website doesn't seems to work. The browser crashes after clicking the download button. Test

supportTickets.title: Website is unusable on mobile devices
supportTickets.description: When I open the website on a mobile device the layout is messed up.

supportTickets.title: Browser crashes after clicking the `download` button in the main page
supportTickets.description: When I click on the `download` button in the main page the browser crashes. Saying hi to Matt!
